description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Hunter Valley, Australia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Elegant Hunter Valley Apartment-Style Retreat with Championship Golf Course
hotels.description: Leave city life behind and discover the vibrant rolling hills and boundless serenity of the Hunter Valley with a villa escape at Oaks Cypress Lakes Resort. Perfectly set in the heart of historic Pokolbin, one of Australia's most cherished wine countries, this self-contained apartment-style oasis is an idyllic hideaway featuring laidback country elegance, high-end gastronomy and no shortage of championship golf. Villas are designed to take full advantage of the location, with private balconies offering an elevated position overlooking boundless rambling hinterland.

hotels.title: Five-Star Hunter Valley Spicers Retreat with Award-Winning French-Inspired Bistro
hotels.description: Experience the wine-flavoured magic of New South Wale's Hunter Valley with a stay at the adults-only Spicers Vineyards Estate, a five-star abode residing on its own private estate of chardonnay, cabernet sauvignon and merlot grapes. Wander elegant gardens, brush past sun-drenched vineyards and be pampered at the onsite day spa. For an award-winning wining and dining experience, reserve a table at the widely applauded Restaurant Botanica, which serves a tantalising menu of modern Australian with a French bistro twist.

hotels.title: Five-Star Tuscan-Inspired Golf & Wine Lovers' Escape in the Hunter Valley
hotels.description: Find the true meaning of tranquility in the vibrant rolling hills of the Hunter Valley at Château Élan at The Vintage, Hunter Valley. Set in the heart of Australia’s premium wine country, this European-inspired five-star retreat brings a little piece of Tuscany to New South Wales, with laidback country elegance and high-end gastronomy. Rooms are designed to take full advantage of the location, with floor-to-ceiling windows, private terraces or balconies offering an elevated position overlooking the verdant greenery of the rolling hills and The Vintage golf course. Relish the delights of seasonal local produce and views over the golf course at Legends Grill or dine alfresco at Spike Bar. Should the sun be shining, practise your swing at the hotel’s award-winning 18-hole golf course designed by Greg Norman, or watch the world go by at the 25-metre lap pool. If you’d rather unwind, the peaceful Hunter Valley Day Spa will help with relaxation, rejuvenation and recuperation. And while leaving the hotel is optional, there’s more to see further afield - from wine and cheese tastings to early-morning hot air balloon rides and exploring many walking or cycling trails.

hotels.title: Romantic Hunter Valley Adults-Only Villas
hotels.description: Indulge in a year-round romantic escape in the world-famous Hunter Valley wine region at the ultra-luxe Cedars Mount View, a collection of private, self-contained villas dotted amid rolling greenery. Swap the bustle of city life for a glass of shiraz and immerse yourself in the mountainous beauty of regional New South Wales. Discover award-winning wines and epicurean indulgences on a sensual escape through rolling olive groves and vine-laced hills. After a busy day exploring the region, sink into your deep-soaking bathtub or enjoy the tranquility of your surroundings on your private deck. Add on romantic extras to make your stay extra-special: melt away with an in-villa massage or treat yourself to a charcuterie board or champagne, delivered to the comfort of your room.

hotels.vendor_name: voco Kirkton Park Hunter Valley , an IHG Hotel
hotels.title: Hunter Valley Wine-Country Estate with Paddock-to-Plate Restaurant
hotels.description: Escape and unwind amid 70 acres of manicured gardens at voco™ Kirkton Park Hunter Valley by IHG, a memorable wine-country escape in the heart of Pokolbin in NSW. Taste the flavours of the Hunter Valley region with estate-to-plate dishes at the onsite Locavore restaurant, sip award-winning wines by the glowing fire in the Epoche Lounge Bar, or indulge in an exclusive high tea served in the sunny Conservatory with views across the rose garden. Other convenient facilities include a modern fitness centre, a Grecian-inspired heated indoor swimming pool and tennis and basketball courts.

hotels.title: Hunter Valley Spanish-Inspired Luxury Lodge with Acclaimed Restaurant & Whiskey Distillery
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the magic of the Hunter Valley with a stay at the five-star Tower Lodge, an all-inclusive sanctuary in the Pokolbin wine region. Home to an acclaimed fine dining restaurant - featuring a menu that celebrates the region's intrinsic connection to food and wine - and the Hunter Valley’s first whiskey distillery, this Spanish-inspired stay offers the ultimate home away from home for those seeking the finer things in life. Once you've tasted the region's bounty, deepen your connection to the local area with a range of recreational activities, including hot-air balloon adventures, heli-tours, private tipple tastings and mountain biking adventures.

hotels.title: Tranquil Hunter Valley Wine Country Escape with Pool, Spa & Restaurants
hotels.description: Go to where the wine flows, vines are rich and full, and lush hills endlessly roll - Rydges Resort Hunter Valley. Perched among a myriad of cellar doors, this is the ideal countryside hideaway, just a few hours from Sydney. Between vineyard-hopping, sit down to a delicious meal at one of the hotel’s own dining outlets, perfect your swing on the golf course, or enjoy a rejuvenating visit to the tranquil day spa.

hotels.title: NSW: Hunter Valley Boutique Vineyard Stay
hotels.description: Framed by the verdant vineyards of Pokolbin, The Convent Hunter Valley delivers a luxurious stay and gourmet greatness in a soothing location. Start the morning with a refined breakfast before entertaining yourself with a relaxed game of boules or an energetic bout of tennis. As evening falls, take in sunset views over manicured gardens before sampling award-winning vintages at Pepper Tree Winery or dining on farm-to-fork organic fare at Circa 1876 restaurant.
